basic example.good string: This has a [link](example.com) that will stay put
basic example.good string no translation: This has a [link](example.com) but will not be translated
basic example.good string with repeated link: This has a [link](example.com) but the link [repeats](example.com)
basic example.added redactable content: This has a [link](example.com) and will have redactable content added
basic example.removed redactable content: This has a [link](example.com) and will have have a [second link](example2.com) removed
basic example.reused redaction: This has a [link](example.com) and will add a redaction with the same index
basic example.manufactured redaction: This has a [link](example.com) and will add a redaction with a different index
basic example.malformed redaction: This [link](example.com) redaction will have broken formatting
